name: Find the Dragon balls!
description:
A simple Puzzle Game made using GB Studio. Huge Dragon Ball fan! Enjoy.

A please do post your comments, you feedback is very important for my journey to become a Game Designer!

Objective -

 - Find All 7 dragon balls to beat the game.

Controls -

A - to interact or move objects

B - to shoot beams to destory objects

Up, Down, Left, Right to move.

Note: Once you collect all 7, the message may not pop immediately. You must move to another scene(When screen fades in).
